page.description: The Connection String dialog allows you to define a connection with a SQL back-end database in your Desktop application. You can open the Connection String dialog from the Database Explorer.

step.description: Optionally, to use an existing connection string:

case.description: Select Use a named connection string.
Select the connection string from the drop-down list.

step.description: Optionally, to create a new connection string:

case.description: Optionally, enter the string into the text box.
Optionally, click Build to display the Create SQL Connection String dialog.
Optionally, click Save as named connection string to create a reusable connection.
